All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary 
    Class Description
    Card
    The class 'Card' depicts a model of a real card that players play with and the deck, discard pile, trading areas etc. are filled with A card has one CardType which gives information about the Rewards (eg. 3 cards are worth 1 coin) and the number of occurences in the card deck (or draw pile)
    CardClassTest  
    CardTypes
    The enumeration 'CardTypes' describes a datatype for all avaiable card types in the game Each CardType has a varying maximum number of instances in the card deck described by the maxCardCount variable, a name which specifies the toString output and specific Rewards depending on the CardType
    Field
    The class 'Field' depicts a model of a player's harvest field Each player starts with two fields, is able to buy a third one, and plants and harvests bean cards from these fields
    GameInvoker
    The class 'GameInvoker' handles the task of starting the game in the console and simulates one round in the game until the deck is empty It creates a GameManager object and asks the user for an input, one of which starts the game Shows the game implementation and includes dependency injection
    GameManager
    The class starts the game and implements the public interface IGameManager
    GameManagerTest  
    GameModule  
    GameSettingItem
    The class 'GameSettingItem' describes a single user customizable setting for the game
    GameSettings
    The class 'GameSettings' describes user customizable settings for the game It includes a collection of GameSettingItems which are able to tweak certain game variables
    GameStates
    The enumeration 'GameStates' describes a datatype for possible states a game can be in This can be used to restrict access to certain methods
    IGameManager
    The interface 'IGameManager' sets up the needed methods which a concrete GameManager has to implement
    Player
    The class 'Player' depicts a model of a real player participating at the game A player is identified by his name and position, has a hand, trading area, treasury and multiple harvest fields
    PlayerTest  
    Reward
    The class 'Reward' depicts a model of a card's rewards A reward is specified by varying combinations of amount of cards needed for certain amount of coins Each reward depends on the CardType of a card For example to receive a coin a player needs to plant and harvest either 4 BlueBeans or only 2 RedBeans
    Table
    The class 'Table' describes the model of a real game table including the cards that are on the table (the deck and discard pile), the players sitting around the table and manages these instances
    TableClassTest  
    TradingManager
    The class 'TableManager' handles the task of trading between players
    TurnPhases
    The enumeration 'TurnPhases' describes a datatype for a turn's possible phases This can be used to restrict access to certain methods A turn goes through all the turn phases
